snippet: The filing was aimed at stopping a flight of deposits from the bank, whose parent company in Andorra was accused by the U.S. of money laundering.
lead_paragraph: The filing was aimed at stopping a flight of deposits from the bank, whose parent company in Andorra was accused by the U.S. of money laundering.

headline.main: Banco de Madrid Files for Bankruptcy Protection
headline.print_headline: Banco De Madrid Files for Bankruptcy Protection
